CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 21, reads: "3. Winner of the grand prize, Mrs. Lillie Harris, is presented with the Bendix Economat Washer by Saul B. Pearlstein"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Saul B. Pearlstein presenting Bendix Economat Washer to Lillie Harris, in Syria Mosque for the Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
